titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files, 1977-1978
titlepage.subtitle:

The University of Virginia Archives

The University of Virginia Library RG-2/1/2.801
titlepage.publisher: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files
1977-1978

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-2/1/2.801, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the library on 1980 July 16.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These files constitute the major record series generated by the president of the University of Virginia. The records consist chiefly of correspondence, but also include reports, minutes, clippings, memoranda, and related papers concerning all areas of business of the president's office.
The papers consist of general and administrative committee files.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
SERIES I: General Records, 1977-1978, Boxes 1-22
SERIES II: Administrative Committees, 1977-1978, Boxes 22-23
SERIES III: Restricted Material, 1977-1978, Box 24
